title: Leadership Enhancement Program Through English Immersion Travel

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Conversation and Understanding of Work-Related Vocabulary
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive program designed to enhance global competencies for corporate managers/leaders. Applies a blended approach combining offline experiential activities with mobile-based online learning

learning_goals: Improvement of oral English communication skills in daily work contexts (pronunciation, fluency, vocabulary utilization).
Acquisition of situational English expressions through role-play in simulated travel contexts.
Development of intercultural communication strategies via team-based projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
